eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.manager

Class DataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.manager.DataSource

  • public class DataSource
extends Object
    Instantiates a connection to retrieve attribute values from one of the following possible data sources: (i) a path to a CSV file; or (ii) a JDBC connection pool; or (iii) an HTTP connection to a REST API.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataSource

        public DataSource(String key,
                  JdbcConnectionPool jdbcConnPool)
        Constructor for JDBC data sources
        Parameters:
        key - Internal identifier used for this data source.
        jdbcConnPool - JDBC connection pool for connecting to a DBMS.

      • DataSource

        public DataSource(String key,
                  String pathDir)
        Constructor for CSV data sources
        Parameters:
        key - Internal identifier used for this data source.
        pathDir - Directory on local disk or URL in a remote HTTP/FTP server that contains CSV data files.

      • DataSource

        public DataSource(String key,
                  HttpRestConnector httpConn)
        Constructor for REST API data sources
        Parameters:
        key - Internal identifier used for this data source.
        httpConn - HTTP connection for accessing REST APIs (or another instance of a SimSearch service).
